direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve state changes and resource management, but in opposite directions (starting vs. shutting down).
Both methods interact with the STUN stack and involve state checks, though for different purposes (discovery vs. shutdown).
Both methods interact with the STUN stack and handle network resources, though for different operations (testing vs. shutdown).
Both methods involve sending requests and managing responses, though for different purposes (STUN request vs. shutdown).

enhanced_by.reason: The start method initializes the state required for the shutDown method to operate correctly.
The checkStarted method ensures the object is in the correct state before shutDown can be called.
The equals method can be used to verify the state of the object after shutDown has been called.
